name: Debby_Notes
0:
”Alexa open Debby Notes”
”Alexa tell Debby Notes that the spare car key is behind the TV”
”Alexa ask Debby Notes where is the spare car key”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: debby notes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Debby Notes helps you remember where things are. You can tell Debby Notes where something is and later ask for a reminder. A Debby Notes mobile app is available to extend the skill by providing the following capabilities:
• An Alexa skill with complementary mobile app that is dedicated to help you remember where things are
• Simple to use search function to locate things on the mobile app or just ask Alexa
• Things and location information are securely stored in cloud
• Stored information are accessible from multiple mobile devices
• Mobile app can save things and locations while mobile device is off-line
• Off-line data are automatically synchronized when mobile devices are back on-line
